about_the_game:
A Fast-Paced Action Game Taking Inspiration from Classic Shoot-em-ups

Features over 8,000 hand-drawn animation frames!

You'll only need to pick up three controls to play the game: 'Directional keys', 'Attack', 'Jump', and 'Special Attack'.

Arm yourself with unique weapons found in supply crates to complete your mission!

Supply Crate Weapons

You'll be able to obtain special weapons from supply crates or drones throughout the stage.

Handgun:
Your starting weapon. Unlimited ammo, but isn't automatic.

Machine Gun:
An easy-to-use weapon for its automatic firing. High ammo capacity.

Shotgun:
Best used in close quarters. Lacks automatic fire and range, but its spread can hit targets both above and below you.

Grenade Launcher:
Only fires single shots and has a low ammo capacity, but its explosions can take out multiple targets.

Hand Grenade:
Like the grenade launcher, its explosions are able to dispatch many targets in one go.

Medkits:
Will fully recover your health when picked up.

The Nude State

If your health drops below half, you will enter the 'nude state'. Be careful! In this state, enemies will try to violate her if they get too close!

Pregnancy and Egg Laying

There are certain enemies that you may come into contact with while in the nude state that will lay eggs in you,
causing you to go into the 'Pregnant' state. If certain conditions are met while in the pregnant state, you will
end up laying eggs.

If your health drops to zero while in the pregnant state, you will respawn with the state cured. If you want to see
an egg-laying scene, you should find a medkit as soon as you can. Medkits will not cure the pregnant state.

Zoom Functionality

Sex animations will zoom in automatically for your full enjoyment. The zoom function can be turned on/off from the settings menu.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains explicit sexual content that is meant for adults only. 

All characters depicted are 18 or older.

This game contains adult themes including: Interspecies Sex, Nonconsensual Sex, Pregnancy, Egg Laying, and Gore.

name: METAL BREAKER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: A fast-paced, adult side scrolling shooter inspired by classic shoot-em-up games.
